page.title: 02AMENITIES
page.content: THE AREA HAS A WIDE VARIETY OF AMENITIES DISTRIBUTED AROUND THE AREAS OF RESIDENTIAL HOUSING.THESE AMENITIES REFLECT THE NEEDS OF THE PEOPLE IN THESE AREAS. THE SHOPPING FACILITIES ARE ON A SMALL SCALE COMPRISING SMALL GENERAL STORES AND SUB-POST OFFICES.(FOR WIDER SHOPPING NEEDS SEE TRADE PAGE) THE AREA IS WELL CATERED FOR WITH PUBLIC HOUSES PARTICULARLY THE VILLAGES OF{HERNE AND BROOMFIELD. THE AREA CATERS FOR THE ELDERLY AND INFIRM WITH NUMEROUS NURSING AND OLD PEOPLES HOMES,THESE BEING SPREAD OVER THE WHOLE AREA BUT WITH A LARGE NUMBER IN THE MAIN TOWN. THERE ARE CHURCHES OF VARIOUS DENOMINATIONS THROUGHOUT THE AREA AS WELL AS A LARGE CHRISTIAN HOLIDAY AND CONFERENCE CENTRE. THERE IS MINIMAL INDUSTRY BUT CAR WORKSHOPS AND GARAGES ARE PREVALENT.
